long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ProductiviTree: A browser management tool for all!

● Displays a tree and infographic on your browsing habits.

● Draws a tree dependent on the number of tabs you currently have open.

● Promotes productivity by encouraging the removal of unnecessary tabs.

● Displays your top 15 recently visited sites to help you view your browsing habits.

Exit out of unnecessary tabs and watch your tree grow!
